name: DesktopThis
description:
An Hacking Game.

Currently you are able to hack Cameras and Transfer the Money to your Bitcoin Account.

There are also Apps like Notes, Dype(Skype parody), Auto Loot(For gathering Money from Emails), and Camera Search.

But dont get caught from the police, or you have to pay a fine otherwise you will be arrested.

This Game is currently in Development Version 1.0.9

On 14.01.2018 the first apk file for android of DesktopThis was released.
